00016     public string BuildYahooURI(string strTicker,string strStartDate, string strEndDate)
00017     {
00018         string strReturn = "";
00019 
00020         DateTime dStart = Convert.ToDateTime(strStartDate);
00021         DateTime dEnd = Convert.ToDateTime(strEndDate);
00022         string sStartDay = dStart.Day.ToString();
00023         string sStartMonth = (dStart.Month - 1).ToString();
00024         string sStartYear = dStart.Year.ToString();
00025         string sEndDay = dEnd.Day.ToString();
00026         string sEndMonth = (dEnd.Month - 1).ToString();
00027         string sEndYear = dEnd.Year.ToString();
00028         StringBuilder sYahooURI =
00029           new StringBuilder("http://ichart.finance.yahoo.com/table.csv?s=");
00030         sYahooURI.Append(strTicker);
00031         sYahooURI.Append("&a=");
00032         sYahooURI.Append(sStartMonth);
00033         sYahooURI.Append("&b=");
00034         sYahooURI.Append(sStartDay);
00035         sYahooURI.Append("&c=");
00036         sYahooURI.Append(sStartYear);
00037         sYahooURI.Append("&d=");
00038         sYahooURI.Append(sEndMonth);
00039         sYahooURI.Append("&e=");
00040         sYahooURI.Append(sEndDay);
00041         sYahooURI.Append("&f=");
00042         sYahooURI.Append(sEndYear);
00043         sYahooURI.Append("&g=d");
00044         sYahooURI.Append("&ignore=.csv");
00045         strReturn = sYahooURI.ToString();
00046 
00047         return strReturn;
00048     }

00050     public XmlDocument getXML(string strTicker,string strStartDate, string strEndDate)
00051     {
00052         XmlDocument xReturn = new XmlDocument();
00053         DataSet result = new DataSet();
00054 
00055         string sYahooURI = BuildYahooURI(strTicker, strStartDate, strEndDate);
00056 
00057         WebClient wc = new WebClient();
00058         Stream yData = wc.OpenRead(sYahooURI);
00059 
00060         result = GenerateDataSet(yData);
00061 
00062         StringWriter stringWriter = new StringWriter();
00063         XmlTextWriter xmlTextwriter = new XmlTextWriter(stringWriter);
00064 
00065         result.WriteXml(xmlTextwriter, XmlWriteMode.IgnoreSchema);
00066 
00067         XmlNode xRoot = xReturn.CreateElement("root");
00068         xReturn.AppendChild(xRoot);
00069         xReturn.LoadXml(stringWriter.ToString());
00070 
00071         return xReturn;
00072     }

00074     public DataSet GenerateDataSet(Stream data)
00075     {
00076         //filename = SaveStreamToTempFile(data);
00077 
00078         string tempFilePath = @"C:\projects\EEC626\openvisualization\TempData.csv";
00079 
00080         FileStream fs = new FileStream(tempFilePath,FileMode.OpenOrCreate);
00081 
00082         Copy(data, fs);
00083 
00084         fs.Close();
00085 
00086         String conn = @"Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Data Source=C:\;Extended Properties=""Text;HDR=No;FMT=Delimited""";
00087 
00088         OleDbConnection cn = new OleDbConnection(conn);
00089         OleDbCommand cmd = new OleDbCommand(string.Format(@"SELECT * FROM {0}",tempFilePath), cn);
00090         OleDbDataAdapter da = new OleDbDataAdapter(cmd);
00091 
00092         cn.Open();
00093 
00094         DataSet ds = new DataSet("YahooFinance");
00095 
00096 
00097         da.Fill(ds);
00098         ds.Tables[0].TableName = "TimeSeries";
00099 
00100         File.Delete(tempFilePath);
00101 
00102         return ds;
00103 
00104         //DataTable dt = ds.Tables[0]; 
00105     }

00107     public void Copy(Stream source, Stream target)
00108     {
00109         byte[] buffer = new byte[0x10000];
00110         int bytes;
00111         try
00112         {
00113             while ((bytes = source.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)
00114             {
00115                 target.Write(buffer, 0, bytes);
00116             }
00117         }
00118         finally
00119         {
00120             target.Flush();
00121             target.Close();
00122         }
00123     }
